WorkItem.Description:
4.0.14.0b, Cat model, Safari on Mac OS X
 
Load up a set of talents and select the "Balance" tree in the talent pane, so that none of the talents visible have any points allocated.
 
Now select the drop-down menu and select a different set of talents by (a) clicking and releasing on the drop-down box and then (b) clicking and releasing on the saved talent set.
 
If you make this a talent set that is far enough down the list that the cursor is over one of the first tier talents when you do this, as well as selecting the talent set you will *also* place one point into that talent, as if you had subsequently clicked on the talent.  See attached image for positioning required for this effect to occur.

Comments.Message: See second attached image for result of performing the section in the described location.
